name: CustomCameraMode
type: enum
summary: |
  Changes the player's camera mode.
description: |
  Changes the player's camera mode.
codesamples: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
items:
  - name: Default
    summary: |
      The default camera mode is classic.
    value: 0
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Classic
    summary: |
      Camera tracks the player but will not automatically rotate if the player
      walks left or right.
    value: 1
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Follow
    summary: |
      Camera tracks the player and automatically rotates if the player walks
      left or right.
    value: 2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
